vendor_name: Glasson Country House Hotel & Golf Club
title: Gourmet Lakeside Golf Escape in the Irish Countryside
description: Enjoy a quintessential country Ireland escape at the Glasson Country House Hotel & Golf Club, where panoramic lakeside views are complemented by a gorgeous restaurant, spa and picturesque golf course. Indulge in daily breakfast, a four-course gourmet dinner on one night of your stay, EUR40 towards spa treatments and EUR40 golf credit.
location_description: Glasson Country House Hotel & Golf Club
